class_notes: DABSN Semester 1, Session One: May 17 - June 23, 2021.
course_description: This course covers pathophysiology and therapeutics associated with multiple disease conditions. Students will translate their understanding of pathophysiology, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics to clinical decision making for health promotion, risk reduction and disease management.
